title: Is Braum still any good?
body: Exactly what the title says, is Braum any good? I used to main home but haven't supported in a while. While we are on the topic is Taric still good either?

replies.body: Hey boys I have a broken Braum build. Go top and get these items{{item:3748}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3053}}{{item:3071}} {{item:3006}}. I usually get first blood with braum top. First back get{{item:3077}}  for better wave clear. Bruam top main issue is the minions
Braum is amazing. Might consider building tanky quite early; armor alongside sight stone.
RIGHT NOW, Braum is decent and Taric is relatively bad. But honestly, play whoever your best is, since you're kinda stuck in B5. In low bronze, Meta doesn't really matter.
